	region Belgrade_Province

	year_founded 0
	population 3000
	plan_set default_set
	faction_creator hungary

	{
		type core_building stone_wall
	}
		building
	{
		type barracks town_watch
	}
	building
	{
		type hinterland_roads roads
	}
	building
	{
		type city_hall town_hall
	}
	building
	{
		type hinterland_farms farms
	}

}

settlement
{
	level city
	region Amsterdam_Province

	year_founded 0
	population 8000
	plan_set default_set
	faction_creator moors
	building
	{
		type core_building stone_wall
	}
	building
	{
		type hinterland_roads paved_roads
	}
	building
	{
		type barracks town_guard
	}
	building
	{
		type market market
	}
	building
	{
		type city_hall town_hall
	}
	building
	{
		type tower ballista_towers
	}
	building
	{
		type hinterland_farms farms+1
	}
		building
	{
		type port dockyard
	}
		building
	{
		type cannon gunsmith
	}
	
}

	}
	building
	{
		type city_hall town_hall
	}
	building
	{
		type market corn_exchange
	}
	building
	{
		type hinterland_roads roads
	}
	building
	{
		type hinterland_farms farms
	}
}


character	Philip, named character, male, leader, age 33, x 160, y 167    ; Яссы      
army
unit		fra_hussar				exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0

	region Warsaw_Province

	}
